id.description: Unique identifier, used for identifying unique resource.

entity.description: Data entity to submit in the requesting body

entities.description: Array of data entities to submit in the requesting body

idOrCode.description: Station ID or Code, used for identifying a station

stationIDOrCode.description: Station ID or Code, used for filtering the response

filterText.description: Text used to filter resources by specific properties (i.e. names and codes of station)

pageCount.description: The number of items to return per page, default is 50

stationTypes.description: Comma-separated list of station type IDs or codes

agencies.description: Comma-separated list of agency IDs or codes

regressionTypes.description: Comma-separated list of regression type IDs or codes

variableTypes.description: Comma-separated list of variable type IDs or codes

statisticGroups.description: Comma-separated list of statistic group IDs or codes

includeStats.description: Boolean value signifying whether to include the station characteristics and statistics

lat.description: Latitudinal location of user selected point in decimal degrees using ESRI SRID 4326

lon.description: Longitudinal location of user selected point in decimal degrees using ESRI SRID 4326

locationSource.description: Source of latitude and longitude coordinates in string format

distance.description: Search distance along network (upstream and downstream) in kilometers

regions.description: Comma-separated list of region IDs or codes

defTypes.description: Comma separated list of statistic group definition types. The options are FS meaning Flow Statistic or BC meaning Basin Characteristic.
